error.unexpected: An unexpected error occured during daily preparations. See the console (F12) for details.
error.unattended: Some alerts are still unattended. Please click on the alert triangles to resolve them.

drop.wrongType: The dropped item does not have the right type (needed: {types}).
drop.wrongCategory: The dropped item does not have the right category (needed: {categories}).
drop.wrongTradition: The dropped item does not have the right tradition (needed: {traditions}).
drop.wrongSchool: The dropped item does not have the right school (needed: {schools}).
drop.wrongLevel: The dropped item level does not have the right level (needed: {levels}).
drop.wrongLevelLow: The dropped item level is too low for this slot ({level}).
drop.wrongLevelHigh: The dropped item level is too high for this slot ({level}).
drop.wrongTraitAnd: The dropped item does not have all the traits (needed all: {traits}).
drop.wrongTraitOr: The dropped item does not have either of the traits (needed any: {traits}).
drop.wrongTraits: The dropped item has mismatched traits.
drop.wrongSkill: The dropped item does not have the right prerequisite skills ({skills}).
drop.wrongRarity: The dropped item does not have the right rarity ({rarities}).
drop.wrongSource: The dropped item does not originate from the right source ({sources}).
drop.wrongCustom: The dropped item didn't match the filters.
drop.notFeat: Only feats can be dropped here.
drop.notSpell: Only spells can be dropped here.

code.newVersion: There is a new version {version} of the extension that is available to download, not updating it may result in experiencing some issues. You can find the extension here: https://github.com/reonZ/pf2e-dailies-ext
code.notify:
If you want to have a better experience while creating homebrew dailies, there is an extension for the module that replaces this with a very powerful text editor including all the typings of the module.
The extension module is not registered with the foundry but you can find it here: https://github.com/reonZ/pf2e-dailies-ext

delete.title: Delete Daily
delete.content: Are you sure you want to dlete this daily ?

template.noEmpty: Some fields are not optional, please make sure you provide entries for all the fields which are not specified (optional).
template.badResistance: A resistance value must be strictly supperior to 0.

tooltips.label: (optional) Label used in the preparation interface and chat message. If left empty, the name of the root item will be used instead.
tooltips.uuid: The uuid of the root item (feat, equipment, etc.) that will decide if this daily is used or not (if the character has said item).
tooltips.resistances: Comma separated list of resistances from which the user will be able to select.
tooltips.resistance: The value of the resistance gained.
tooltips.feattype: (optional) Comma separated list of feat types used in the filter.
tooltips.feattraits: (optional) Comma separated list of feat traits used in the filter.
tooltips.featlevel: (optional) The max feat level used in the filter. Can be a number or one of the shortcuts 'level' and 'half' which respectively use the actor's level or half its value.
tooltips.spelllevel: (optional) The level to which the spell will be heightened. Can be left empty to use the original level of the spell.
tooltips.spellcategory: (optional) Comma separated list of spell categories.
tooltips.spelltraits: (optional) Comma separated list of spell traits used in the filter.
tooltips.traditions: (optional) Comma separated list of spell traditions used in the filter.
tooltips.spelllevels: (optional) Comma separated list of spell levels used in the filter. If a single number is provided, it will be used as the upper range value. Can be one of the shortcuts 'level' and 'half' which respectively use the actor's level or half its value.

default.label: Default
default.hint: This is the default template boilerplate.

trainedSkill.label: Trained Skill
trainedSkill.hint: This template was used for feats like Ancestral Longevity or Ageless Spirit to upgrade one skill or create a new lore with the proficiency rank of Trained.

trainedLore.label: Trained Lore
trainedLore.hint: This template was used for the Quick Study feat to create a new lore with the proficiency rank of Trained.

language.label: Language
language.hint: This template was used with the Ancestral Linguistics feat and the Bort's Blessing ring to add a new language.

resistance.label: Resistance
resistance.hint: This template was used for the Elementalist dedication and Ganzi heritage to add a new resistance among a predefined set of options.

feat.label: Feat
feat.hint: This template was used for the Metamagical Experimentation feat to create a new feat.

spell.label: Spell
spell.hint: This template will allow the creation of a new spell which is added to a temporary spellcasting entry.

tome.label: Thaumaturgy Tome
tome.hint: This is what the code would look like if the Tome implement of the Thaumaturge class was a homebrew daily, it highlights the use of children with conditions and the use of the prepare function.

flexibility.label: Combat Flexibility
flexibility.hint: This is what the code would look like if the Combat Flexibility feat was a homebrew daily, it is a very simple example of drop rows with spell filters and child predicate.

savant.label: Scroll Savant
savant.hint: This is what the code would look like if the Scroll Savant feat was a homebrew daily. We gather some simple data in the prepare function and use it for the condition function of the different rows.

mind.label: Mind Smith
mind.hint: This is what the code would look like if the Mind Smith dedication was a homebrow daily. This is by far the most complex example, the rows make use of both child predicates and condition, everything is falling appart if the character doesn't have a mind weapon equiped (the weapon is in a compendium pack) and that is why we are using the alert row to create said weapon if needed. It also make use of the rest function to clean up the mind weapon.

weapon.title: Mind Weapon
weapon.flavor:
This character doesn't have a mind weapon in their inventory.

Please select one of the following options to create one.

option.0: A one-handed weapon that deals 1d4 damage and has the agile and finesse traits
option.1: A one-handed weapon that deals 1d6 damage and has the finesse trait
option.2: A one-handed weapon that deals 1d8 damage
option.3: A two-handed weapon that deals 1d10 damage and has the reach trait

error.noSelection: You must select one weapon base type.
error.missing: The weapon couldn't be found in the compendium.

error.unexpected: An unexpected error occured during preparation of the module PF2e Dailies. See the console (F12) for details.
error.unrested: You must rest before your daily preparations.
error.duplicate: A daily with this key already exists.
error.invalidKey: The daily key must be a string.
error.noLibwrapper: The module now requires the dependency module 'libwrapper' to work at its best.
error.noCharacterSelected: No Character were provided to the openDailyInterface function.

message.changes: Has made the following changes during their daily preparations.
message.noChanges: Has made no changes during their daily preparations, you didn't even need to know about it really.
message.spells: Is ready to use the spells:
message.mindsmith: Is focusing on the mind weapon:

rations.used: Consumed one of their {name} and has {nb} remaining.
rations.almost: Consumed one of their {name} and has only {nb} remaining.

dailiesRequest.content: It is that time of the day, please make you daily preparations.

familiar.name: Familiar Abilities
familiar.hint: Comma separated effect UUIDs. Those will be added to the list of familiar abilities.

customs.name: Custom Dailies
customs.hint: Register you own dailies to the module.
customs.label: Register

watch.name: Watch For Request
watch.hint: Enable this option if you plan on using the 'requestDailies' api function, otherwise, clicking on the button in the chat message will not do anything.
